faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about us

items.question: How does AI article generation work?
items.answer: We analyze top-ranking content for your topic and use advanced AI to generate unique, comprehensive articles. Provide a topic and keywords, and we handle the structure, writing, and optimization.

items.question: Is the content SEO-friendly?
items.answer: Yes. Our AI is trained on SEO best practices. It naturally integrates keywords, structures content with proper headings (H1, H2, H3), and generates meta descriptions to help you rank higher.

items.question: Do you use my data to train AI?
items.answer: No. You own your content. Your private data is not used to train our models without explicit consent. Data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and you can request deletion at any time.

items.question: What analytics do I get?
items.answer: Page views, time on page, bounce rate, and keyword rankings. Metrics can be integrated from Google Analytics and Search Console.

items.question: What if a scheduled post fails?
items.answer: We automatically retry with exponential backoff and notify you by email/WhatsApp. You can reschedule in one click and see clear error reasons.

items.question: Can I customize the AIâ€‘generated content?
items.answer: Yes. Edit anything before publishing: text, tone, headings, and images. The AI is a starting point; your voice leads.

items.question: How many articles can I schedule?
items.answer: Starter plan: unlimited scheduled posts for one blog. Growth: unlimited scheduling plus bulk scheduling, recurring posts, and multiâ€‘blog support.

items.question: Do you offer team collaboration and approvals?
items.answer: Yes. Roleâ€‘based permissions, draft, review, approve workflows, version history, and an audit trail (Enterprise).

items.question: Which platforms are supported?
items.answer: WordPress, Webflow, Ghost, Medium, and custom CMS via API.

items.question: Do you suggest keywords?
items.answer: Yes. We provide keyword suggestions based on search volume and competition to help you target the right topics.

items.question: Do you integrate with other tools?
items.answer: CSV/Sheets export is included. Webhooks and API are available on Enterprise. Optional Slack/Teams notifications.

items.question: What uptime and reliability can I expect?
items.answer: 99.9% uptime target with zeroâ€‘downtime deployments and monitoring/autoâ€‘recovery.

items.question: Can I import or migrate my content?
items.answer: Yes. CSV import and calendar migration from popular tools are supported.

items.question: Can I cancel anytime? Any hidden fees?
items.answer: Yes, no lockâ€‘in or hidden fees. Cancel in two clicks. 30â€‘day moneyâ€‘back guarantee.

items.question: Are you GDPR compliant?
items.answer: Yes. We are GDPR compliant and can provide a Data Processing Addendum (DPA) upon request.

items.question: What are your support response times?
items.answer: Email and WhatsApp support. Priority response on Pro/Enterprise.

items.question: Do you support multiple blogs?
items.answer: Yes. Manage multiple blogs and websites on higher plans.

items.question: Who owns the content I generate?
items.answer: You do. You retain rights to your generated text and images, with commercial use licensing included.
